cast.name: 格特劳德·杰瑟勒 Gertraud Jesserer
阿尔弗雷德·多尔弗 Alfred Dorfer
布兰科·萨马罗夫斯基 Branko Samarovski
米夏埃尔·克赖斯尔 Michael Kreihsl
尼古拉斯·奥夫恰雷克 Nicholas Ofczarek

writer.name: 阿尔弗雷德·多尔弗 Alfred Dorfer

introduction: Heinz Hoschek returns to his parents' empty flat. The mother died, and his father is in a sanatory. Hoscheck, a former bankmanager has lost his job and his marriage is broken too. In his loneliness he thinks of the better times he once had: vacation at the sea, birthday parties, school and collegetime and his engagement ... under the influence of alcohol and pills Hoscheck loses more and more the ability to see the difference between reality and fantasy.So he gets visited by allegoric figures - such as the Death and the Ghost of the 70s, but he also gets visited by his very real female neighbour he always had a crush on when he was young on years.Heinz Hoscheck's desire is also water: so he pushes himself for the last time to find a job and becomes life guard in a public pool.
